flow.name: GetTaxes
flow.description: Answers total taxes for an Invoice stored in Zuora, given its id. This flows expects an inbound invoiceId to be set. Answers an string with a message describing the total tax amount for the invoice

expression-transformer.expression: Taxes calculates successfully for invoice #[header:inbound:invoiceId]. Total tax is $#[groovy:payload.totalTaxable]

flow.name: GetZuoraInvoiceByInvoiceId
flow.description: Retrieves an Invoice record from Zuora given its Id. Answers the record as payload, and sets the following invocation headers: * TODO

zuora:find.zquery: select interestingProperty1, interestingProperty2 from Item where id = '#[header:inbound:invoiceId]'

flow.name: GetZuoraInvoiceItemsByInvoiceId
flow.description: Retrieves a collection of InvoiceItems from Zuora given it's invoice id. Answers the collection of items.

zuora:find.zquery: select interestingProperty1, interestingProperty2 from InvoiceItem where invoiceId = '#[header:inbound:invoiceId]'
